about_the_game:
The contents of the Little Noah: Scion of Paradise DLC 2: Avatar, Lilliput, and Accessory Pack are as follows.

Avatars
Talk to the Champion on the airship with the "Avatars" speech bubble over her head to change to one of these new avatars.
1. Ruler of the Racetrack Noah
2. Sub Zero Knight Noah

Lilliputs
These Lilliputs appear at random in the ruins. Enlist their aid and expand your repertoire!
1. Quickshot (★★★)
2. Oceane (★★★)
3. Hanzo (★★★)

Accessories
These accessories appear at random in the ruins.
1. Meteorite Emblem (★★★)
2. Blizzard Emblem (★★★)
3. Electroshock Emblem (★★★)
4. Treacherous Gloves (★★★)
5. Swift Combat Boots (★★★)
Emblems: Deal added damage when you fulfill certain conditions.
Treacherous Gloves & Swift Combat Boots: Confer advantages in battle.
Use these items wisely to make the most out of each expedition!

【Notice】
* DLC items can only be accessed if you've also purchased the main game of Little Noah: Scion of Paradise.
* This DLC is also included in Little Noah: Scion of Paradise Special Edition, and the DLC 1+2 Pass. Please check to make sure you don't make overlapping purchases.
* An internet connection is required to access the DLC items in-game. You will also need to have the latest version of the game downloaded.
detailed_description:
The contents of the Little Noah: Scion of Paradise DLC 2: Avatar, Lilliput, and Accessory Pack are as follows.

Avatars
Talk to the Champion on the airship with the "Avatars" speech bubble over her head to change to one of these new avatars.
1. Ruler of the Racetrack Noah
2. Sub Zero Knight Noah

Lilliputs
These Lilliputs appear at random in the ruins. Enlist their aid and expand your repertoire!
1. Quickshot (★★★)
2. Oceane (★★★)
3. Hanzo (★★★)

Accessories
These accessories appear at random in the ruins.
1. Meteorite Emblem (★★★)
2. Blizzard Emblem (★★★)
3. Electroshock Emblem (★★★)
4. Treacherous Gloves (★★★)
5. Swift Combat Boots (★★★)
Emblems: Deal added damage when you fulfill certain conditions.
Treacherous Gloves & Swift Combat Boots: Confer advantages in battle.
Use these items wisely to make the most out of each expedition!

【Notice】
* DLC items can only be accessed if you've also purchased the main game of Little Noah: Scion of Paradise.
* This DLC is also included in Little Noah: Scion of Paradise Special Edition, and the DLC 1+2 Pass. Please check to make sure you don't make overlapping purchases.
* An internet connection is required to access the DLC items in-game. You will also need to have the latest version of the game downloaded.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join the genius alchemist Noah and her cat companion Zipper as they explore ancient ruins to uncover the secrets hidden within! Create unique teams and combos from 40+ recruitable allies in this casual but compelling game!
supported_languages:
English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
